summary: Lost in a foreign part of the country after running away for his life, a little boy whose family have been killed during the war is saved and trained by a middle-aged woman.
cast: Susan Taslimi|Parviz Poorhosseini|Adnan Afravian|Bashu|Akbar Doodkar|Farokhlagha Hushmand
title: Bashu, gharibeye koochak
